properties.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 15 at 8:42AM MST until January 16 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
...BITTER COLD WIND CHILLS RETURNING TONIGHT...

.Even though wind chills will ease just a bit today, expect
breezy winds and clearing skies to bring colder wind chills
tonight.

* WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero.

* WHERE...Eastern Roosevelt County.

* WHEN...Tonight through Thursday morning.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect east winds overnight up to 20 mph.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST THURSDAY
